@Metric.description: An annotation that contains the metadata information when requesting a metric to be injected or produced. This annotation can be used on fields of type Meter, Timer, Counter, and Histogram. For Gauge, the @Metric annotation can only be used on producer methods/fields.

@Counted.description: Denotes a counter, which counts the invocations of the annotated object.

@Gauge.description: Denotes a gauge, which samples the value of the annotated object.

@ConcurrentGauge.description: Denotes a gauge which counts the parallel invocations of the annotated object.

@Metered.description: Denotes a meter, which tracks the frequency of invocations of the annotated object.

@Timed.description: Denotes a timer, which tracks duration of the annotated object.

@SimplyTimed.description: Denotes a simple timer, which tracks duration and invocations of the annotated object.

@RegistryType.description: Qualifies the scope of Metric Registry to inject when injecting a MetricRegistry.
